title: Shrinking Sea Ice Could Put Polar Bears In Grave Peril By 2100
teaser: A new study looks at the future of the Canadian Arctic Archipelago and finds that by the end of this century, the region might be ice-free for 2 to 5 months, something that puts bears in grave peril.
